impactMedia.title: Village Learning Center Inauguration
impactMedia.description: Opening of our 25th learning center in rural Rajasthan, providing quality education to 200+ children

impactMedia.title: Free Medical Camp - Bihar
impactMedia.description: Over 350 patients received free health checkups and medicines in our monthly medical camp

impactMedia.title: Women's Tailoring Graduation Ceremony
impactMedia.description: 45 women received certificates after completing our 6-month tailoring and entrepreneurship program

impactMedia.title: Clean Water for Village Kasimpur
impactMedia.description: Installation of hand pumps bringing clean drinking water to 500+ families

impactMedia.title: Scholarship Distribution Ceremony
impactMedia.description: 120 meritorious students from economically weaker sections received annual scholarships

impactMedia.title: Organic Farming Training Workshop
impactMedia.description: 85 farmers learned sustainable agriculture practices and pesticide-free cultivation methods

impactMedia.title: New Homes for Flood Victims
impactMedia.description: 15 disaster-resistant houses constructed for families who lost everything in floods

impactMedia.title: Community Health Awareness Camp
impactMedia.description: Nutrition and hygiene awareness session attended by 200+ mothers and children

impactMedia.title: Self-Help Group Meeting
impactMedia.description: Monthly meeting of our SHG where women discuss business plans and financial literacy

impactMedia.title: School Infrastructure Development
impactMedia.description: Renovation of government school including new classrooms, toilets, and playground

impactMedia.title: Flood Relief Distribution
impactMedia.description: Emergency relief materials including food, water, and medicines distributed to 500+ families

impactMedia.title: Digital Literacy Program
impactMedia.description: Rural youth learning computer skills to improve their employability and income
